title: If you're last pick and are going to dodge...
body:
Then do it at the beginning of the champ select! Don't make us all select our champs and waste our time because you just have to be "sure" that you're not gonna get the role you wanted to make your dodge "count". Go play team builder or queue up with friends.**It's not that hard.
**

I'm tired of this happening like 5 times in a row before finally getting into a game with at least 15 minutes+ wasted because of dodgers.
